page.title: 18MOTTRAM COUNTY PRIMARY
page.content:
The school has facilites for all {major sports}and there are many{clubs and{societies.}The social activites undertaken by pupils include raising money for{charities,}as well as participation in young{enterprise {groups. Initially the school had some problems but these have since been resolved, and it is now running sucessfully.
{ Mottram St.Andrews County Primary opened in{1908}and is still in the original building. There are{52 pupils,2 fulltime {teachers,1 part time,and the Head.}The children are divided into{3 classes. The school takes pupils from {Alderley,Mottram,and Wilmslow.}When they leave at eleven some go to {Macclesfield,}others to{Wilmslow.
